text: Pronto condoms are a brand of sheath being released in South Africa, designed by Willem van Rensburg. The outside protective packaging acts as the condom applicator as well, which reduces the time needed to use the condom. The designer was inspired to create a new style of condom because, according to him, people find the slow process of applying a condom is "a passion-killer and they're willing to take their chances." (with reference to unprotected sex)."Fast condoms on sale in S Africa BBC News. URL Accessed November 6, 2006. ==References== Category:Condom brands
title: Pronto condoms
